{"command":"str_replace","path":"/workspace/benchmark/datasets/20-CAD/context-aware-decoding-main/unit_test/unit_test_1.py","old_str":"    device = input_ids.device
    alpha = 0.5  # default as in the paper, ignore input alpha
    generated = input_ids.clone()
    max_gen_len = 128
    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    for _ in range(max_gen_len):
        # Forward with context (context+question)
        outputs_with_context = model(generated)
        logits_with_context = outputs_with_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Forward without context (question only)
        question_only = generated[:, context_len:]
        outputs_without_context = model(question_only)
        logits_without_context = outputs_without_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Adjusted logits
        adjusted_logits = (1+alpha)*logits_with_context - alpha*logits_without_context
        next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
        generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
        if (next_token == eos_token_id).all():
            break
    return generated
","new_str":"    device = input_ids.device
    alpha = 0.5
    generated = input_ids.clone()
    max_gen_len = 128
    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    # Prepare past_key_values for both context+question and question only
    with torch.no_grad():
        # Initial forward for context+question
        out_with_context = model(generated, use_cache=True)
        past_with_context = out_with_context.past_key_values
        # Initial forward for question only
        question_only = generated[:, context_len:]
        out_without_context = model(question_only, use_cache=True)
        past_without_context = out_without_context.past_key_values
        for _ in range(max_gen_len):
            # Get logits for next token (context+question)
            logits_with_context = model(
                input_ids=generated[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_with_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).logits[:, -1, :]
            past_with_context = model(
                input_ids=generated[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_with_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).past_key_values
            # Get logits for next token (question only)
            q_only = generated[:, context_len:]
            logits_without_context = model(
                input_ids=q_only[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_without_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).logits[:, -1, :]
            past_without_context = model(
                input_ids=q_only[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_without_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).past_key_values
            # Adjusted logits
            adjusted_logits = (1+alpha)*logits_with_context - alpha*logits_without_context
            next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
            generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
            if (next_token == eos_token_id).all():
                break
    return generated

function.name: str_replace_editor

args.old_str:
device = input_ids.device
    alpha = 0.5  # default as in the paper, ignore input alpha
    generated = input_ids.clone()
    max_gen_len = 128
    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    for _ in range(max_gen_len):
        # Forward with context (context+question)
        outputs_with_context = model(generated)
        logits_with_context = outputs_with_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Forward without context (question only)
        question_only = generated[:, context_len:]
        outputs_without_context = model(question_only)
        logits_without_context = outputs_without_context.logits[:, -1, :]
        # Adjusted logits
        adjusted_logits = (1+alpha)*logits_with_context - alpha*logits_without_context
        next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
        generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
        if (next_token == eos_token_id).all():
            break
    return generated
args.new_str:
device = input_ids.device
    alpha = 0.5
    generated = input_ids.clone()
    max_gen_len = 128
    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    # Prepare past_key_values for both context+question and question only
    with torch.no_grad():
        # Initial forward for context+question
        out_with_context = model(generated, use_cache=True)
        past_with_context = out_with_context.past_key_values
        # Initial forward for question only
        question_only = generated[:, context_len:]
        out_without_context = model(question_only, use_cache=True)
        past_without_context = out_without_context.past_key_values
        for _ in range(max_gen_len):
            # Get logits for next token (context+question)
            logits_with_context = model(
                input_ids=generated[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_with_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).logits[:, -1, :]
            past_with_context = model(
                input_ids=generated[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_with_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).past_key_values
            # Get logits for next token (question only)
            q_only = generated[:, context_len:]
            logits_without_context = model(
                input_ids=q_only[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_without_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).logits[:, -1, :]
            past_without_context = model(
                input_ids=q_only[:, -1:],
                past_key_values=past_without_context,
                use_cache=True
            ).past_key_values
            # Adjusted logits
            adjusted_logits = (1+alpha)*logits_with_context - alpha*logits_without_context
            next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
            generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
            if (next_token == eos_token_id).all():
                break
    return generated
